required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Comparison of Care Practices, Mortality and Morbidity of Very Preterm Infants Between Two Tertiary Centers in Northwest and South of China
clinical_study.official_title: Comparison of Care Practices, Mortality and Morbidity of Very Preterm Infants Between Two Tertiary Centers in Northwest and South of China

brief_summary.textblock: Care practices, mortality and morbidity of very premature infants from two different tertiary centers were collected and compared, in order to discover areas for improvement where these two newborn centers can learn from each other.

detailed_description.textblock: This retrospective cohort study was conducted in two hospitals,Qinghai Red Cross Hospital and Jinan University affiliated Shenzhen Baoan Women's and Children's Hospital.Very premature infants born with a gestational age between 23+0 - 31+6 weeks admitted to both centers during 3 years from January 1, 2018 to December 31, 2020 were studied. In both centers, data including maternal characteristics, neonatal characteristics, obstetric practices, delivery room practices, NICU practices and neonatal outcomes, were collected by data abstractors in each NICU. Anonymous data was transferred to Shenzhen and analyses were performed at the newborn center of SZH.

primary_outcome.description: Survival at last discharge from NICU
severe neurological injury, moderate to severe BPD, NEC or severe ROP

arm_group.arm_group_label: Shenzhen Baoan Women's and Children's Hospital

study_pop.textblock: Very premature infants born with a gestational age between 23+0 - 31+6 weeks admitted to newborn centers of Qinghai Red Cross Hospital and Shenzhen Baoan Women's and Children's Hospital from Jan 1, 2018 to Dec 31, 2020.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Very premature infants born with a gestational age between 23+0 - 31+6 weeksï¼›
- Admitted to both centers during 3 years from January 1, 2018 to December 31, 2020.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Infants not born at QHH or SZH (out born);
- Infants who had major congenital anomalies;
- Infants ho were early transferred out.

facility.name: Shenzhen Baoan Women's and Children's Hospital

responsible_party.investigator_title: Nan Jing Maternity and Child Health Care Hospital
